item.title: Check if a String contains another String in Java
item.description: Core Java classes provide different solutions that developers can use to check if a String contains another String inside it. In this article we will show you different Java code examples how to check if a String is inside another String using core Java methods such as String.contains(), String.indexOf(), String.lastIndexOf(), String.matches() and java.util.regex.Pattern class. Java code how to use String.contains() In this code example we use String.contains() which returns a boolean value true if and only if the String contains a specific substring.
